text:
@NYGovCuomo I am asking people to please join me in praying for you Andrew, that you might look upon your Lord Jesus Christ, and join His fight for "every" human life.  He suffered and died for people with coronavirus and people unborn.  He suffered and died for you.
https://t.co/O3tU2rE37V https://t.co/91FMLugPAU

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
